job description:
Job Description
Are you ready for a challenging, yet rewarding career? Are you a Data Analyst professional with EXTENSIVE experience with MS excel, Access and power point? If you answered yes, then let's talk!

UPG Company, LLC IS seeking a Sales Data Analyst to provide analytical support to sales and business development teams by performing various technical, and analytical task, and assignments.

REPORTING RELATIONSHIP:

Reports to Global Sales Director

KEY SUCCESS FACTORS:
  • Advanced to Expert level experience and knowledge in Microsoft Office, specifically, Excel, PowerPoint, and Word
  • Ability to establish and build rapport and relationships with key stakeholders and decision makers.
  • Independently motivated, a collaborative teammate with an affinity for adapting to different situations and personalities.
COMPENTENCIES:

1. Data-Driven

2. Proficient in Microsoft Access – Performing queries

3. Advance level skills in Microsoft Excel
  • Use advanced functions (Names, VLOOKUP, IF, IS).
  • Power Query
  • Proficient in Function Formulas
  • Work with Pivot Tables.
4. Advance level skills in Microsoft PowerPoint
  • Create a template and work with a Design template.
  • Work with graphics, animation and multimedia, inserting movies and sound.
  • Work with the Office Suite to create slides from an outline and send slides to Microsoft Word.
  • Customize PowerPoint toolbars and automate the slide production.
  • Use Auto-Correct and the Style Checker.
  • Technical Capacity.
ESSENTIAL FUNCTIONS:

1. Data Coordination and Field Reporting:
  • Interpret data and analyze results using statistical techniques and provide ongoing reports across multiple spreadsheets
  • Identify, analyze, and interpret trends or patterns in complex data sets
  • Maintains existing sales reports and designs new reports as needed.
  • Prepares and administers Sales Funnel reporting on a monthly, and quarterly basis.
  • Coordinates sales data across all sites.
  • Experience with using ODBC Connection and querying Microsoft Access
  • Querying AS/400 is a plus.
2. Presentations Preparation:
  • Develops and maintains professional PowerPoint presentations in conjunction with global sales teams.
  • Build interactive presentations, using hyperlinks, creating interactive objects, working with Slide Show options, and using the Meeting Minder.
  • Evaluates third-party solutions for appropriate sales operations functions as needed.
3. Technical Capacity:
  • Utilizes the appropriate systems to generate and produce specific user-end reporting.
  • Maintains all sales demonstration tools and applications.
  • Prepares and track quotes, and contracts for potential and existing customers.
  • Maintains all quote documentation with accurate pricing and configurations.
  • May assist in New Product Introduction planning and process.
4. Other Duties:
  • Maintains up-to-date awareness of company activities, industry trends and government regulations.
  • Will provide administrative support as and where needed.
  • Coordinates and sends out the daily sales flash reporting.
  • Performs other duties as assigned by functional manager.
